title: TVD Basics
description: Test your knowledge of The Vampire Diaries!

questions.question: What town does The Vampire Diaries take place in?
questions.explanation: The Vampire Diaries is set in the fictional town of Mystic Falls, Virginia.

questions.question: Who is the main protagonist of the series?
questions.explanation: Elena Gilbert, played by Nina Dobrev, is the main protagonist of the series.

questions.question: Stefan and Damon Salvatore are brothers.
questions.explanation: Stefan and Damon are indeed brothers who were both turned into vampires in 1864.

questions.question: What plant is toxic to vampires in this universe?
questions.explanation: Vervain is toxic to vampires and prevents compulsion when worn or consumed by humans.

questions.question: What is Elena's younger brother's name?
questions.explanation: Jeremy Gilbert is Elena's younger brother, played by Steven R. McQueen.

questions.question: The Vampire Diaries is based on a book series.
questions.explanation: The show is based on the book series of the same name by L.J. Smith.

questions.question: What allows vampires to walk in the sun?
questions.explanation: Daylight rings, enchanted by witches with lapis lazuli stones, allow vampires to walk in sunlight.

questions.question: How many seasons did The Vampire Diaries run for?
questions.explanation: The Vampire Diaries ran for 8 seasons from 2009 to 2017.
